summary: A destruction mage follower that is marriageable
descriptionHtml:
Inspired by Melisandre from Game of Thrones, I bring you Scarlette. She is a Breton, skilled at Destruction Magic. She has mostly fire spells, but also some frost and thunder. She is also marriageable.

She is in the Blue Palace (Solitude) as soon as you enter the door on the left side.

REQUIRED MODS:
Apachii Sky Hair - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
***Please note, you must download both the Full Version AND the female additional hairstyles.

Mods used in the screenshots to get the look: (besides Apachii)
CBBE - body AND facepack - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?
Elven Dresses - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39922/?
Velvet Robes and Cloaks - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49130/?
KD Circlets redone by zzjay - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27064/?

For Manual Installation:
Drag and Drop the files into your Data folder. Typically, this folder is found:
C://Program Files/Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim/Data

Load order (make sure this mod is after all required mods in load order.)
author: Kaolinite77
